name: Azeria
description:
Game made for Quarantine Jam - AM Studio

# Controls:

Arrow LeftMove leftArrow UpJumpArrow RightMove right

# Game quick description

Azeria - simple platformer, where you must use "A LOT OF .." cards (They give you some modifications like increasing speed, adjusting view and jump height etc.) for almost the whole time.

# Advice

You can use cards description below to read the meaning of the cards

Cards description (Spoiler)"A LOT OF speed"speed = speed * 2"A LOT OF energy"jump_height = jump_height * 2"A LOT OF view"camera_zoom = camera_zoom  / 2"A LOT OF time"Engine.time_scale = 0.5

# Credits:

Music used:
